branchCategory.name: C(D)BJ2, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, End Lock
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CJ2-Z stainless steel tube, air cylinders are available in 10 and 16mm bore sizes with stroke lengths from 15mm to 200mm. Available in 7 mounting types for versatility. Auto switches are available in band and rail mounting types. The CJ2-Z switch bracket is transparent to improve visibility of the indicator LED. Pivot and rod end brackets can be ordered with the cylinder under one part number.</p>
